TOP 1
FROM (SELECT * FROM sys_login_infor WHERE username = #{username} AND status = '00000' ORDER BY login_time ) WHERE rownum=1
FROM sys_login_infor WHERE username = #{username} AND status = '00000' ORDER BY login_time

SELECT
FROM sys_login_infor a
AND a.username LIKE
'%,'||#{username}||',%' CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
AND a.ipaddr LIKE
'%,'||#{ipaddr}||',%' CONCAT('%', #{ipaddr}, '%')
AND a.status != '00000'
AND a.status = #{status}
AND (FIND_IN_SET(#{deptId},d.parent_ids) AND ('${deptId}' = ANY(STRING_TO_ARRAY(d.parent_ids, ',')) AND (INSTR(','||d.parent_ids||',',',${deptId},') > 0 AND (CHARINDEX(','+'${deptId}'+',', ','+d.parent_ids+',') > 0 OR a.dept_id = '${deptId}')
AND date_format(a.login_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(a.login_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')
AND a.login_time >= '${beginTime}'::TIMESTAMP
AND a.login_time < ('${endTime}'::TIMESTAMP + '1 day')
AND ${sql_filter}
